mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TIMESLOT_SETTING(start_time, end_time, cutoff) VALUES( #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{cutoff} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TIMESLOT_SETTING SET start_time=#{startTime}, end_time=#{endTime}, cutoff=#{cutoff} WHERE timeslot_setting_id=#{timeslotSettingID}
mapper.select: SELECT timeslot_setting_id timeslotSettingID, start_time startTime, end_time endTime, cutoff cutoff FROM TIMESLOT_SETTING ORDER BY start_time ASC, end_time ASC
